title: Léo Mattéï, brigade des mineurs
overview: Leo Mattei, captain of the Paris Juvenile Protection Unit. Highly trained and deeply compassionate, but above all, totally committed to the safety and well-being of kids and teens. And when he needs to bend the law for them, he does. Leo Mattei's fast-paced, emotionally charged investigations explore a vast array of issues faced by kids and their families, in today's world.
